explains: n. 客观，超然，冷漠；分遣队，独立小分队；拆卸，分离
wordGroup: detachment fault 拆离断层；滑脱断层；脱顶断层；挤离断层

sentences.en: She felt a sense of detachment from what was going on.
sentences.cn: 她对眼前发生的事感到很超然。

sentences.en: His mask of detachment cracked, and she saw for an instant an angry and violent man.
sentences.cn: 他冷静超然的伪装破碎了，她一瞬间看到了一个愤怒而又狂暴的男人。

sentences.en: There is this "detachment" and I realize that there are obviously experiences which would overwhelm everyone.
sentences.cn: 有了这种“超然”，我意识到显然有一些经历会压垮所有人。
